entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Webequie
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon then 40 percent chance of rain showers. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
